languages.text: Ксеноустройство обесточено — нужно подключить питание, чтобы использовать его.
The xenodevice is lacking energy. You will have to connect it to a power source to use it.
languages.original_text: Ксеноустройство обесточено — нужно подключить питание, чтобы использовать его.

traits.locale_text: The xenos device is unpowered. You must connect it to a power source to use it.

languages.text: Dem Xenogerät mangelt es an Energie. Du musst es an eine Energiequelle anschließen, um es zu benutzen.
languages.original_text: The xenodevice is lacking energy. You will have to connect it to a power source to use it.

traits.locale_text: Dem Xenogerät mangelt es an Energie. Du musst es an eine Energiequelle anschließen, um es zu benutzen.

languages.text: L'appareil xénos n'est pas alimenté. Vous allez devoir le brancher à une source d'énergie avant de pouvoir l'utiliser.
languages.original_text: The xenodevice is lacking energy. You will have to connect it to a power source to use it.

traits.locale_text: L'appareil xénos n'est pas alimenté. Vous allez devoir le brancher à une source d'énergie avant de pouvoir l'utiliser.

languages.text: El xenodispositivo no tiene energía. Tendrás que conectarlo a una fuente de energía para poder usarlo.
languages.original_text: The xenodevice is lacking energy. You will have to connect it to a power source to use it.

traits.locale_text: El xenodispositivo no tiene energía. Tendrás que conectarlo a una fuente de energía para poder usarlo.

languages.text: 这台异形装置缺乏能量，必须把它连接到电源上才能启动。
languages.original_text: The xenodevice is lacking energy. You will have to connect it to a power source to use it.

traits.locale_text: 这台异形装置缺乏能量，必须把它连接到电源上才能启动。

languages.text: ゼノデバイスには動力が不足している。使用するには、電源に接続する必要がある。
languages.original_text: The xenodevice is lacking energy. You will have to connect it to a power source to use it.

traits.locale_text: ゼノデバイスには動力が不足している。使用するには、電源に接続する必要がある。

languages.text: Zeno cihazının enerjisi tükeniyor. Cihazı kullanabilmen için güç kaynağına bağlaman gerek.
languages.original_text: The xenodevice is lacking energy. You will have to connect it to a power source to use it.

traits.locale_text: Zeno cihazının enerjisi tükeniyor. Cihazı kullanabilmen için güç kaynağına bağlaman gerek.
